subject: Belmont Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: A hoof specialist said that Big Brown, the Kentucky Derby and Preakness champ, does not need a patch on the quarter crack on his left front hoof until the morning of the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: A hoof specialist said that Big Brown, the Kentucky Derby and Preakness champ, does not need a patch on the quarter crack on his left front hoof until the morning of the Belmont Stakes.
